Title: Open Source Friday with Suricata - Real-Time Threat Detection
Description:
✨ Join us live as we dive into Suricata — the powerful open-source IDS/IPS that brings multi-threaded, high-speed network traffic inspection to your toolkit!

We’ll explore how Suricata detects threats, analyzes packets, and integrates with tools like ELK and suricata-update. Expect live demos on config tuning, rule management, and log output with EVE JSON.

Whether you're new to network security or scaling in production, this stream will help you unlock Suricata’s full potential.

Bring your questions and curiosity!
Author: GitHub
